documentation.text:
TO BUILD WE 
1. Write a function called _mint that takes two arguments
(address , tokenId)
2. Add internal visibility to the signature
3. Set the _tokenOwner of the tokenId to the address to 'to'
4. Increase the owner token count by 1 each time the function is called.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC721: minting to the zero address"

arguments.value: ERC721: minting to the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC721: minting to the zero address"
